l01_desc: AshAxiom's unique engine overlays multiple assets on one chart, auto-aligning different trading calendars.
l02_desc: Using .toCorrectNumberYX('y') to extract pure prices and calculate the delta between competitors.
l03_desc: Visualize bivariate functions using the high-level .plot3D() method for mathematical landscapes.
l04_desc: Configure visuals via .color(). Supports named colors, HEX, RGB, and dynamic gradient strings.
l05_desc: How the Brain transforms raw market data into intelligent structures ready for rendering.
cmt_l01: Sync multiple assets on one timeline
cmt_l02: Extract Y-axis and calculate market spread
cmt_l04: Apply custom RGB and Gradient styles
cmt_l05: Transform raw data to coordinate structures
